basic_information.scholarship_name: Family and Consumer Sciences Education Endowed Scholarship

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to students within the College of Education and Professional Studies who are majoring in FACS Eligibility Requirements Must be majoring in Family and Consumer Sciences Education within the College of Education & Professional Studies Have completed at least 60 credit hours Minimum 2.75 GPA Must provide a personal statement outlining career goals and why you are the deserving student for this scholarship Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
